General.Name: Bhageria Industries Limited
General.Description: Bhageria Industries Limited manufactures and sells dyes, dye intermediates, and basic chemicals in India. The company is also engaged in the generation and distribution of solar power, and EPC contracts. It exports its products to South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, China, Indonesia, Thailand, the United States, Europe, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Bhageria Dye Chem Limited and changed its name to Bhageria Industries Limited in August 2015. Bhageria Industries Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Mumbai, India.
